summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Thirty-sixth Avenue, from East Cherry Street to East Spring Street; Thirty-seventh Avenue, from East Cherry Street to East Marion Street; East Marion Street and East Columbia Street, each from Thirty-fifth Avenue to Thirty-seventh Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 463 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
